segments.text: I see a typical kitchen scene, though something feels very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is overflowing, spilling onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming, and her foot is actually in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how unaware she is of the immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, two children are engaged in a mischievous act behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll ever look up and see the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm action and the developing disaster is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange kind of domestic pandemonium.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water sloshing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a quiet storm brewing right in front of her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
